title: Colin Clouts come home againe. By Ed. Spencer
author: Spenser, Edmund, 1552?-1599.
publisher: Printed [by T[homas] C[reede]] for VVilliam Ponsonbie,
notes: Also contains his "Astrophel" and laments on the death of Sir Philip Sidney by Raleigh and others.
Colophon reads "London printed by T.C. for William Ponsonbie. 1595."; printer's name from STC.
Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
